alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Civil Emergency Message issued January 04 at 6:33PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SHELTER IN PLACE ADVISED FOR RESIDENTS NEAR GAS LINE RUPTURE IN CRIVITZ... The following message is transmitted at the request of the Local Emergency Management. A gas main was ruptured this afternoon in the Village of Crivitz near the Marinette County Highway shop on County Highway W. Residents from Henrietta Avenue near County Highway W near Wolfe Street to St. Paul Road to County Highway GG are in the affected area and advised to shelter in place. WPS has shut off the gas line in the affected area and will knock on doors to restore service. There is a warming center at the Village of Crivitz town hall for affected residents.
